Template.title: Children's Miracle Network
Template.Html:
Read More Miracle Stories

 


Learn More About Great Clips 
Great Needs. Great Deeds®

When communities come together, small acts add up to a big difference.  Located in communities across the U.S. and Canada, more than 170 hospitals in the Children's Miracle Network treat the majority of kids with serious illness.  Every October Great Clips salons in those communities sell Miracle Balloons to benefit their local hospital.  Last year, the top salon raised over $5,000 one dollar at a time. 

In 2009, nearly 1,200 salons joined to raise more than $300,000 through Miracle Balloon sales and events like cut-a-thons or bake sales.  Many stylists donate their own time, visiting hospitals to cut children's hair.  These community efforts support medical care, research and education to save and improve the lives of 17 million children each year.  The vast majority of kids with cancer, cystic fibrosis, sickle cell anemia, AIDS and conditions requiring heart or lung transplants get care at Children's Miracle Network hospitals.

Please send this message on our behalf to any family, friend, or colleague.  We'd love them to join us in these simple efforts that make a difference-one miracle at a time.
